#summary Common problems and solutions

=== {{{com.sun.tools.javac.code.Symbol$CompletionFailure: class file for sun.util.resources.OpenListResourceBundle not found}}} ===

You may need to add the Java runtime to Javadoc's classpath. On the command line, if the JAVA_HOME environment variable is set correctly, this is:
{{{
-classpath $JAVA_HOME/jre/lib/rt.jar
}}}
